titles.title: To designate a mountain peak in the State of Montana as "Alex Diekmann Peak".
Alex Diekmann Peak Designation Act of 2017
Alex Diekmann Peak Designation Act of 2017
Alex Diekmann Peak Designation Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary:
Alex Diekmann Peak Designation Act of 2017
This bill designates the 9,765-foot peak located 2.2 miles west-northwest of Finger Mountain on the western boundary of the Lee Metcalf Wilderness in Montana as "Alex Diekmann Peak."
